body_html: The code generating the actual warning message is in tensorflow/core/platform/default/logging.cc:78. Currently all VLOG messages are generated with INFO severity. Since the VLOG numbers don't map cleanly to INFO/WARNING etc., you'd have to add another field to LogMessage, set that field from the constructor used by VLOG, and then output what it contains. Adding this information would make more sense.

body: The code generating the actual warning message is in tensorflow/core/platform/default/logging.cc:78. Currently all VLOG messages are generated with INFO severity. Since the VLOG numbers don't map cleanly to INFO/WARNING etc., you'd have to add another field to LogMessage, set that field from the constructor used by VLOG, and then output what it contains. Adding this information would make more sense.
